column4: bjorn sudo fdisk -l to see all your partitions sudo mount the partition you want
they don't show up in fdisk

I was running as su. I dont really understand what just happend now. They've been plugged in an hour or so, and now suddenly rythmbox started and had found the mp3player. Then a little while later the rest of my usb disk's came. I had done nothing?

I really don't understand it. I did nothing at least the last ten minutes before it mounted. Now fdisk returns some info on the disk. not all good though it "has different physical/logical endings:" Just hope it will be stable
